::Battera:;

She stopped banging on the door.  It wasn't going to open.  And no 
one on the other side was going to open it.  She walked back to her 
chair.  She sat in it and looked around.  Nothing in the room would 
give her cover, except the bed.  She walked over to it and inspected 
it.  She shook her head. Not enought room to try to hide under it, 
she thought.  She looked around some more and saw nothing useful.
She sat back down in her chair and watched the door.  If the maximals 
came to kill her, then she would have to make a break for it.  She 
tried to figure out an escape plan.  But other than the front door, 
there wasn't other way that she knew of to use for escape.
"The vent." she said to herself aloud.  She walked over and saw that 
the vent was too small for her to crawl into.  It wasn't a main vent 
line.  She went ans sat back down.  She realized that if she must 
die, she could at least ask to speak to the leader as a final 
request.  She sighed and slumped into her chair.  She shook her head 
for she knew it was hopeless for her now.  She thought that since Rex 
hated Preds so much, he would just kill her and not worry about 
things. As he said, he was used to fighting.  If he stoppped 
fighting, he most likely wouldn't know what to do with the rest of 
his life, she thought.  She just sat there and waited for the end to 
come.

"All this way to sacrifice myself for a good cause, and all I got for 
it was a bowl of fruit." She laughed alittle at herself for thinking 
like that.
